message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your offer, $100 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  Could you do $130?
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $115?
